entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Stony Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:44 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -36.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stony Rapids Airport 12:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

Temperature: -36.7°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 68 %

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 35.

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
